Posts.Content: Hi just had uterus cancer 7 weeks ago stage 1 everything went great had a total hysterectomy. Just found out I have stage 1 breat cancer can't believe this is happening to me. Anyone else experience one cancer after another. Wondering if they are related. Going to breast surgeon on Saturday,
Posts.Title: Incisional pain after chemo and/or neupogen therapy?

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for talking with me. I was so happy after my uterus cancer it seemed so simply and it was all gone I went to a top doctor. So strangely something said to me I better go for a mammography because maybe estrogen caused the uterus cancer most likely so maybe it caused me to have breast cancer as well. Not that I take any kind of estrogen just hormonal I mean. So I went after not going for seven years because I am very bad with tests I hate waiting for results. I needed two biopsies in my right breast he said they are microcalifications probably stage o. It turned out only one area was cancer stage 1 so now I have to go to a breast surgeon going on Saturday. Wow how can this happen one after another. Part of me says maybe I am luckily everything is being caught early considering I haven't gone in a long time. I dont know what it means stage 1 invasive
Posts.Title: please help i am scared

Posts.Content: I am going to breast surgeon on Saturday!
Posts.Title: please help i am scared

Posts.Content: recently had uterus cancer and had a complete hysterectory and no further treatment doing great. just went for a mommgraphy and now have breast cancer grade 1 very have infiltrading invasive grade 1 and now need to take care of that. how can i have one cancer after another anyone else to happened to?
Posts.Title: please help i am scared

Posts.Content: i picked up the reports to take to the doctor on saturday dont know what ia am reading but it sounds scarey. it says its infiltrating ductal carcinoma , poorly differentiated, grade 3 with extensive necrosism measuring 2.5mm. i called a cancer hot line they told me it was stage 1 but is very aggressive if not taken care of. wonder if that what this means. anyone know?
Posts.Title: please help i am scared
